## ğŸ“‹ Checklist
### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### CDK Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] CDK constructs follow best practices
- [ ] CDK synthesis produces valid CloudFormation
- [ ] CDK unit tests added/updated
- [ ] CDK integration tests pass

### CloudFormation Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] CloudFormation templates are valid
- [ ] Parameters are properly documented
- [ ] Outputs are meaningful and documented
- [ ] Templates follow AWS best practices

### Security
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] IAM policies follow least privilege principle
- [ ] Security groups are properly configured
- [ ] Encryption is used where appropriate

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] Deployment guides updated if needed
- [ ] Configuration examples updated if needed
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide updated if needed
